page.title: 18Farms.
page.content: Farms now days are very busy all the year round.Redhill Farm. The farmer has one full-time worker named Jean.The busiest time of the year is the harvest time when the farm has to bring in the corn before the rain comes.They have four tractors and other machinery.They have 162 acres,twenty used for wheat and the other 142 is used for cows and the house.They have Hereford cows for their beef.The land they have is heavy clay and is used mostly for grazing.The farmer rarely goes on holiday but he does go down to the beach for a day in the summer.In the summer he hires out a combine harvester to get the wheat in. He only has one hay stack.He feeds his cattle three times a day on straw.
